s.cutBottomPanel.t: The bottom panel is not shown
s.cutBottomPanel.d: The **Bottom panel** is a rectangular of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.cutFrontPanel.t: The front panel is not shown
s.cutFrontPanel.d: The **Front panel** is a rectangular of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.cutStrap.d: The **Strap** is a rectangular of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.cutStrapReducedSa.t: The strap is not shown (and has reduced seam allowance)
s.cutStrapReducedSa.d: The **Strap** is a rectangular of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.cutZipperPanel.t: The zipper panel is not shown
s.cutZipperPanel.d: The **Zipper panel** is a rectangular of {{{ width }}} wide and {{{ length }}} long.
s.strapSaReduced.t: The strap seam allowance is reduced
s.strapSaReduced.d: Because of how narrow the strap is, we have reduced the seam allowance on it to be 80% of the strap width

size.d: Controls the overall size of the handbag

zipperSize.d: Which size of zipper to use

zipperSize.#3.d: #3 zippers have teeth that are 3mm wide

zipperSize.#4.d: #4 zippers have teeth that are 4mm wide.

zipperSize.#4.5.d: #4.5 zippers have teeth that are 4.5mm wide.

zipperSize.#5.d: #5 zippers have teeth that are 5mm wide.

zipperSize.#6.d: #6 zippers have teeth that are 6mm wide.

zipperSize.#8.d: #8 zippers have teeth that are 8mm wide.

zipperSize.#10.d: #10 zippers have teeth that are 10mm wide.

zipperSize.invisible.d: An invisible zipper is a zipper that can be inserted in such a way that the teeth do not show.

strapLength.d: Controls the length of the strap

handleWidth.d: Controls the width of the handle
